content.question: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze the differences in the ideas held by various Enlightenment figures concerning the roles of women in European society.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze the differences in the ideas held by various Enlightenment figures concerning the roles of women in European society.

topic.text: 4.1: Contextualizing the Scientific Revolution and Enlightenment

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
